question_text: A group of market women sell at least one of yam, plantain and maize. 12 of them sell maize, 10 sell yam and 14 sell plantain. 5 sell plantain and maize, 4 sell yam and maize, 2 sell yam and plantain only while 3 sell all the three items. How many women are in the group
If log₁₀ 8 = X, evaluate log₁₀ 5 in terms of X.
If (a² b⁻³ c)^(3/4) / (a⁻¹ b⁴ c⁵) = a^p b^q c^r, what is the value of p + 2q?
If |2 3; 5 3x| = |4 1; 3 2x|, find the value of x
In a class of 40 students, 32 offer Mathematics, 24 offer Physics and 4 offer neither Mathematics nor Physics. How many offer both Mathematics and Physics
The second term of a geometric series is -2/3 and its sum to infinity is 3/2. Find its common ratio

Tickets for the school play were priced at ₦520.00 each for adults and ₦250.00 each for kids. How many kids' tickets were sold if the total sales were ₦171,000.00 and there were 5 times as many adult tickets sold as children's tickets?
